channel.title: The Hobbit
channel.description:
A new trailer was released today, 9-19-2012 [url]https://trailers.apple.com/trailers/wb/thehobbit/[/url]
For those who are new, here are the previous videos that Peter Jackson released about the making of The Hobbit.

item.title: The Hobbit
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
I wanna see this. It looks absolutely awesome! Loved the book when I read it back before I hit puberty.

Looks like the movies will be even more epic than the book describes.

What’s sad though is that many of my friends don’t seem to have any interest in the movie.

Read full topic
